section.title: Replacing a Ceph Monitor Node
section.para: Steps for replacing a Ceph monitor node.
&kw-hos; supports hosting the Ceph monitor service in the following configurations:

listitem.para: On a controller node
On a dedicated resource node
On a dedicated cluster node

section.para: If you are hosting the Ceph monitor service on a controller node, then we have separate instructions for how to replace a controller node. See for more details.
If you configured your environment to have a dedicated resource for your Ceph monitor service, then these steps will assist you in replacing that node if that is needed.

Edit your ~/openstack/my_cloud/definition/data/servers.yml file to include the details of the replacement Ceph monitor node you are adding. Ensure that the role and server-group settings are the same as the Ceph monitor node you are replacing.
